_metadata.description: GBD Disease Name to PubMed/MeSH Search Term Mapping
notes: Each GBD disease maps to one or more PubMed search strategies
combined: Full query string for complex searches
priority: CRITICAL = must fix, HIGH = should fix, NORMAL = ok
Extended to cover all GBD diseases with proper MeSH mappings
Updated to use MeSH Major Topics [Majr] for higher precision

Tracheal, bronchus, and lung cancer.combined: ("Lung Neoplasms"[Majr] OR "lung cancer"[tiab] OR "lung carcinoma"[tiab] OR "NSCLC"[tiab] OR "bronchogenic"[tiab])

Brain and central nervous system cancer.combined: ("Brain Neoplasms"[Majr] OR "Glioma"[Majr] OR "brain tumor"[tiab] OR "brain cancer"[tiab] OR "glioblastoma"[tiab])

Colon and rectum cancer.combined: ("Colorectal Neoplasms"[Majr] OR "colorectal cancer"[tiab] OR "colon cancer"[tiab] OR "CRC"[tiab])

Other malignant neoplasms.notes: Very broad category - may need disease-specific sub-queries

Intestinal nematode infections.combined: ("Nematode Infections"[Majr] OR "Ascariasis"[Majr] OR "soil-transmitted helminth"[tiab] OR "intestinal parasit"[tiab])

Road injuries.combined: ("Accidents, Traffic"[Majr] OR "road traffic"[tiab] OR "motor vehicle accident"[tiab])

Ischemic heart disease.combined: ("Myocardial Ischemia"[Majr] OR "Coronary Artery Disease"[Majr] OR "coronary heart disease"[tiab])

Blindness and vision loss.combined: ("Blindness"[Majr] OR "Vision Disorders"[Majr] OR "vision loss"[tiab] OR "visual impairment"[tiab])

Non-rheumatic valvular heart disease.combined: ("Heart Valve Diseases"[Majr] OR "valvular heart"[tiab] OR "aortic stenosis"[tiab])

mesh_terms: Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions
Adverse effects of medical treatment.combined: ("Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions"[Majr] OR "adverse drug"[tiab] OR "iatrogenic"[tiab])

Bacterial skin diseases.combined: ("Skin Diseases, Bacterial"[Majr] OR "bacterial skin"[tiab] OR "skin infection"[tiab])

Eye cancer.combined: ("Eye Neoplasms"[Majr] OR "Retinoblastoma"[Majr] OR "ocular cancer"[tiab] OR "eye tumor"[tiab])

Lower extremity peripheral arterial dise.combined: ("Peripheral Arterial Disease"[Majr] OR "peripheral arterial disease"[tiab] OR "PAD"[tiab] OR "claudication"[tiab])

Kidney cancer.combined: ("Kidney Neoplasms"[Majr] OR "renal cell carcinoma"[tiab] OR "kidney cancer"[tiab])

Liver cancer.combined: ("Liver Neoplasms"[Majr] OR "Carcinoma, Hepatocellular"[Majr] OR "liver cancer"[tiab] OR "HCC"[tiab])

Non-melanoma skin cancer.combined: ("Carcinoma, Basal Cell"[Majr] OR "Carcinoma, Squamous Cell"[Majr] OR "non-melanoma skin"[tiab] OR "NMSC"[tiab])

Eating disorders.combined: ("Feeding and Eating Disorders"[Majr] OR "eating disorder"[tiab] OR "anorexia"[tiab])

Motor neuron disease.combined: ("Motor Neuron Disease"[Majr] OR "ALS"[tiab] OR "amyotrophic lateral sclerosis"[tiab])

Interstitial lung disease and pulmonary.combined: ("Lung Diseases, Interstitial"[Majr] OR "interstitial lung"[tiab] OR "pulmonary fibrosis"[tiab])

Chronic kidney disease.combined: ("Renal Insufficiency, Chronic"[Majr] OR "chronic kidney disease"[tiab] OR "CKD"[tiab])

Animal contact.combined: ("Bites and Stings"[Majr] OR "animal bite"[tiab] OR "animal attack"[tiab])

Sudden infant death syndrome.combined: ("Sudden Infant Death"[Majr] OR "SIDS"[tiab] OR "sudden infant death"[tiab])

Endocrine, metabolic, blood, and immune.combined: ("Endocrine System Diseases"[Majr] OR "Metabolic Diseases"[Majr] OR "endocrine disorder"[tiab])
